Title: Digimon Adventure tri: Reunion
Writer: Yuniko Ayana (screenplay), Ardwight Chamberlain (script adaptation), Mitsutaka Hirota (screenplay), Akiyoshi Hongo (creator), Yuko Kakihara (composition), Yuko Kakihara (screenplay), Mark Ryan (script adaptation), Takaaki Suzuki (screenplay)
Actors: Cristina Valenzuela, Vic Mignogna, Johnny Yong Bosch, Cherami Leigh
Plot: After years of inactivity, the DigiDestined regroup with their Digimon to save their world, but have the years changed their characters too much?
